text: dangnan rea di txb rab kar rxngreiyn khxng khea læw rea di pldpeluxng sing thi pen khwam thukkh yak kæ khea læa rea di hı khrxbkhraw khxng khea kæ khea læa chen deiyw kab thi khea di khey mi ma kxn (chen butr hlan læa phwkphxng) pen khwam metta cak rea læa pen khx takteuxn kæ brrda phu thi khearph phakdi
